fields.name: S31_dc_not_required
fields.title: 3-1. Enter a "1" only if all schools and/or RCCIs in the SFA were not required to perform direct certification with SNAP (i.e. NON BASE year Provision 2/3 for all schools), otherwise enter a "0"

fields.name: S32B_dc_snap_stud
fields.title: 3-2. Students directly certified through Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP): Do not include students certified with SNAP through the letter method B. Number of FREE Students
fields.description: 3-2. Students directly certified through Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP): Do not include students certified with SNAP through the letter method B. Number of FREE Students

fields.name: S33B_dc_other_stud
fields.title: 3-3. Students directly certified through other programs: Include those directly certified through Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF), Food Distribution Program on Indian Reservations (FDPIR), or Medicaid (if applicable); those documented as homeless, migrant, runaway, foster, Head Start, Pre-K Even Start, or non-applicant but approved by local officials. DO NOT include SNAP students already reported in 3-2 B. Number of FREE Students
fields.description: 3-3. Students directly certified through other programs: Include those directly certified through Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF), Food Distribution Program on Indian Reservations (FDPIR), or Medicaid (if applicable); those documented as homeless, migrant, runaway, foster, Head Start, Pre-K Even Start, or non-applicant but approved by local officials. DO NOT include SNAP students already reported in 3-2 B. Number of FREE Students

fields.name: S34B_free_snap_letter_stud

fields.name: S51_exempt
fields.title: 5-1. Enter a "1", if ALL schools and/or RCCIs are exempt from verification, otherwise enter a "0"
fields.description: 5-1. Enter a "1", if ALL schools and/or RCCIs are exempt from verification, otherwise enter a "0"

fields.name: S52_yes_by_verif
fields.title: 5-2. Was verification performed and completed? Enter a "1" if Yes, completed by November 15th, otherwise enter a "0"
fields.description: 5-2. Was verification performed and completed? Enter a "1" if Yes, completed by November 15th, otherwise enter a "0"

fields.name: S52_yes_after_verif

fields.description: 5-2. Was verification performed and completed? Enter a "1", if Yes completed after November 15th, otherwise enter a "0"

fields.name: S52_no_verif
fields.title: 5-2. Was verification performed and completed? Enter a "1", if No, verification was NOT performed or the process was not completed, otherwise enter a "0"
fields.description: 5-2. Was verification performed and completed? Enter a "1", if No, verification was NOT performed or the process was not completed, otherwise enter a "0"

fields.name: S531_verif_type_standard
fields.title: 5-3. Type of Verification process used: 1. Enter a "1", if Standard (Lesser of 3% or 3,000 error-prone), otherwise enter a "0"
fields.description: 5-3. Type of Verification process used: 1. Enter a "1", if Standard (Lesser of 3% or 3,000 error-prone), otherwise enter a "0"

fields.name: S532_verif_type_alt_1
fields.title: 5-3. Type of Verification process used: 2. Enter a "1", if Alternate one (Lesser of 3% or 3,000 selected randomly), otherwise enter a "0"
fields.description: 5-3. Type of Verification process used: 2. Enter a "1", if Alternate one (Lesser of 3% or 3,000 selected randomly), otherwise enter a "0"

fields.name: S533_verif_type_alt_2
fields.title: 5-3. Type of Verification process used: 3. Enter a "1", if Alternate two (Lesser of 1% or 1,000 error prone applications PLUS lesser of one-half of one percent or 500 applications with SNAP/TANF/FDPIR case numbers), otherwise enter a "0"
fields.description: 5-3. Type of Verification process used: 3. Enter a "1", if Alternate two (Lesser of 1% or 1,000 error prone applications PLUS lesser of one-half of one percent or 500 applications with SNAP/TANF/FDPIR case numbers), otherwise enter a "0"

fields.description: 5-4. Total ERROR PRONE applications: Report all applications as of October 1st considered error prone
